query.statement: update [Order] set DeliveryDate = '2006/01/01' where CustomerID = @customerID; select @@ROWCOUNT;
select [Order].* from [Order] where [Order].CustomerID = @customerID order by OrderNo asc;
select [Order].* from [Order] where [Order].OfficialID = @officialID order by OrderNo asc;
select * from Company where CustomerType = @customerType order by Name asc;
